Introducing CLANK TANK, a weekly game show created by the @ai16zdao community. Participants submit pitches, which are transformed into AI-generated simulations to impress AI judges. The judges then decide whether the pitch is a 'PUMP' or 'DUMP' (not financial advice). Season 1, Episode 1 premieres this weekend.
You can submit a pitch for CLANK TANK, and an AI-generated character and episode will be created based on your responses. If selected, it may be included in the next episode.
Even though there are many things to fix, it's better to release now and improve over time. More details will be shared tomorrow.

Development focused on new features, including Discord and Twitter end-to-end testing, along with two bug fixes. A total of 20 contributors merged six pull requests, with major work involving various improvements.

categories.title: Clank Tank: AI-Powered Game Show and Development Updates

content.text: Introducing... CLANK TANK! A weekly game show made by the @ai16zdao community where your pitch turns into an AI simulation to impress AI judges who decide if it's a PUMP or DUMP (NFA). S1E1 premieres this weekend.
If youâ€™re wondering what Clank Tank is, hereâ€™s a thread with a demo and explanation.
Clank Tank will have a live premiere. Explainer and submission info available in this thread.
You can submit a pitch for Clank Tank, and an AI will generate a character and episode based on your responses. Follow up if itâ€™ll be included in the next episode.
Clank Tank is not affiliated with the Clankers on Farcaster. No new contract address or token is associated with the show.
No relationship or association between Clank Tank and the Clankers on Farcaster. No contract address for this show.
Clank Tank is premiering at the same time as Killer Whales S2, making it a meta moment.
Hint for getting on Clank Tank: have a rigged 3D avatar ready. If you need something custom, artists are available.
Development focused on new features (Discord + Twitter end-to-end test), 2 bug fixes, with 20 contributors merging 6 PRs. Major work included various improvements.
